**Instance Property**

The maximum width of the slider’s track.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var maximumSliderWidth: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Managing the slider’s value

- **minimumSliderWidth**: The minimum width of the slider’s track.
- **doubleValue**: The double value of the slider.
